data.eml:eml: An old taxonomic dilemma: the identity of the western south Atlantic lebranche mullet (Teleostei: Perciformes: Mugilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Menezes, Naércio A., Oliveira, Cláudio De, Nirchio, Mauro (2010): An old taxonomic dilemma: the identity of the western south Atlantic lebranche mullet (Teleostei: Perciformes: Mugilidae). Zootaxa 2519: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196200
